text:
Ted Cruz' Full 'Meet the Press' Interview 12:04 copied!

Republican presidential candidate Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) sat down with Chuck Todd to talk Trump, his pathway to the nomination and whether he will support any GOP nominee.

Read More
